text: == Events == *April 10 – The Mozart family set out for London, where Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart meets Johann Christian Bach. *Autumn – Following the death of his patron Keyserlingk, Wilhelm Friedemann Bach leaves his post as organist at Halle. *date unknown – The castrato Domenico Annibali retires from the stage. *Carl Ditters von Dittersdorf becomes Kapellmeister at the court of Adam Patachich in Großwardein, replacing Michael Haydn and restructuring the orchestra of the bishop's palace. == Popular music == *The Temple of Comus or Every Gentleman and Lady's Beard, Brent and Lowe: Being Songs for the Year 1764 == Classical music == *Johann Christian Bach – 6 Keyboard Trios, Op. 2 *Joseph Haydn – Symphony no 22 ("Philosopher") *Michael Haydn – Trumpet Concerto *Ignacio de
